name: time-until-i-do
title: Time Until I Do
description: Time Until 'The Big Day' is a customizable Raycast extension that helps you keep track of the time left until your upcoming event. Whether you're counting down to a birthday, anniversary, vacation, or any other special occasion, this extension has you covered. Stay motivated and inspired with its daily quotes and focus points. Download now and start counting down to your big day!
